org.ipdr.api
Class CollectorManager

java.lang.Object
  org.ipdr.api.CollectorManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IncomingConnectionHandler
public class CollectorManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IncomingConnectionHandler

The class provides access to IPDR protocol. The class allows initialization, execution and termination of IPDR collector.

          Holds configuration for the collector

Description copied from interface: IncomingConnectionHandler
Attempts handling of an incoming connection

Specified by:

Parameters:
connection - - connection to handle
Returns:

                                              ConnectionThread thread)
Description copied from interface: IncomingConnectionHandler
Tries to relate the exporter's IP to an exsiting exporterHandler

Specified by:
exporterAddressKnown in interface IncomingConnectionHandler
Parameters:
exportersAddress - - address of the exporter
Returns:
true if the exporter's address has a related handler, false otherwise.

getExporterHandler

protected ExporterHandler getExporterHandler(java.net.InetAddress address)
Searches exporter handler object by exporter IP address

Parameters:
address - - address of exporter to look up
Returns:
ExporterHandler object or null if not found.

public void run()
Executes the collector. Spawns exporter handlers, listening socket, discovery handler (if required)

locateConnectionBySession

public ConnectionThread locateConnectionBySession(byte sessionId,
                                                  java.net.InetAddress exporterAddress)
Locates connection threads which handle the given session id.

Parameters:
sessionId - session id to locate
exporterAddress - exporter to locate the session at.
Returns:
Suitable connection thread. null if none are found
